messages.message: Getting 502 when trying to download a 430MB file (https://instabase.com/matt.weaver/HSBC/fs/Instabase%20Drive/PoV/Passport/ib_passport-0.0.1.ibsolution) from `instabase-prod`. File-service logs show the file size is 0kb https://console.cloud.google.com/logs/query;cursorTimestamp=2021-07-13T04:51:44.927502365[â€¦]AinsertId%3D%221u1cprkg6bewnv4%22?project=instabase-main (https://console.cloud.google.com/logs/query;cursorTimestamp=2021-07-13T04:51:44.927502365Z;query=resource.type%3D%22container%22%0Aresource.labels.cluster_name%3D%22instabase-main-prod-002%22%0Aresource.labels.namespace_id%3D%22instabase-prod%22%0Aresource.labels.project_id%3D%22instabase-main%22%0Aresource.labels.zone:%22us-central1-%22%0Aresource.labels.container_name%3D%2528%22file-tservice%22%20OR%20%22grpc-file-service%22%2529%0Aresource.labels.pod_id:%22deployment-file-tservice-%22%20severity%3E%3DDEFAULT%20matt.weaver%0Atimestamp%3D%222021-07-13T04:51:44.927502365Z%22%0AinsertId%3D%221u1cprkg6bewnv4%22?project=instabase-main). Is anyone else facing this? I see this intermittently.

Hey @Mohit! That log line is a bit misleading. The operation that log line is for is the stat operation, not read (See the [stat] at the beginning of the line). The Size is 0KB because the stat does not return any data.
There should be another log line for the read of that file.
I have most often seen 502 Bad Gateway when the webserver serving the request is down. What time did you try this download? Can we check if webapp restarted at that time?

Its working now i tried 5-6 times and it did not work then. webapp restart was my hypothesis as well, but it did not make 100% sense that a pod restart should affect download. I will let you know if this issues re-surfaces.
